long_description: Similar to the successful Serpico but scaled down to fit smaller faces, the Smith Serpico Slim polarized sunglasses deliver advanced optical protection in a classic style. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Wire-frame construction is lightweight and durable; self-adjusting nose pads and acetate temple tips evenly distribute pressure for comfort. Scratch- and impact-resistant Carbonic(TM) lenses use Tapered Lens Technology from Smith(TM) to provide distortion-free vision. Sunglasses provide 100% protection from the sun's harmful UVA and UVB rays. Silver frames feature polarized platinum gray lenses that allow objects to be seen in their most natural state without color distortion. Gold frames feature polarized gray green lenses which reduce reflected glare and sharpen detail. Serpico Slim sunglasses are sized to fit a medium-size face with medium coverage. Includes soft proctective case that doubles as cleaning cloth.
